fields.description:
h2. Bug

If in {{tiapp.xml}} I have {{<name>Sport Instr.</name>}} then the {{CFBundleURLSchemes}} becomes {{sportinstr_}} which is not valid because Apple doesn't allow it to end with {{_}}.

This needs a little more work at https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/85b3c33f81c853fd273ee1b025e1d87573997f03/iphone/cli/commands/_build.js#L1710
fields.summary: iOS Apps with a period at the end of the name are not able to submit to the store
fields.environment:
Application type: mobile
Titanium SDK: 3.0.2.GA
Alloy Version: 1.1.0 (Works fine on 0.3.6)
Platform & version: iOS 6.1
Device: --
Host Operating System: OSX 10.8.2
Titanium Studio: 3.2.0.201304051943
